```{r}
# 6-9
# Load data
x <- na.omit(ch06$EX.6.9);
# Size of the array
n <- length(x) ; n
# compute mean
sum(x)/n
# R function way
xb <- mean(x) ; xb
# compute sample standard deviation
(xb-x)
# sample variance
sum((xb-x)^2)/(n-1)
# r function
var(x)
# sample standard deviation
sqrt(sum((xb-x)^2)/(n-1))
sd(x)

```
